overview: What does the coffee shop mom want to talk about .. ?  ' Just because I work in a coffee shop doesn't mean I didn't really fall in love. I also had love, and I broke up because I fell in love. I also tried to raise his child as hard as my child , although it is not my child .. But at some point , the child and I had more time .. He gradually neglected the house .. It turned out that he was in contact with his ex and again . It seemed to be going well If only I disappeared .. Everyone was happy .... If I was quiet .. For the one who would become a wonderful husband who waited for his wife .. I left ' Why did my son come to visit me ?  ' Nostalgia for a real mother and a place where you want to lean on unstable youth
title: Café Mom
